subject: SSN4171
description_text:
Hello,

I have just placed an order for the control box forgetting that it comes with the pedal that I have already ordered. Would it be possible to cancel this order before it is shipped.

Kind regards,

David 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi David Kerr,    I apologize for not responding to you promptly. Your package has already been shipped, and we are unable to cancel it. My apologies.
